mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, admin_name, admin_sex, user_id, admin_status, admin_locationcity, admin_site, admin_password, admin_phone, admin_remark) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminLocationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_sex = #{adminSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_status = #{adminStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_locationcity = #{adminLocationcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_site = #{adminSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_phone = #{adminPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_remark = #{adminRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_sex, user_id, admin_status, admin_locationcity, admin_site, admin_password, admin_phone, admin_remark from admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
